1.name: Sharp Claws
1.details: Hellhound's basic attack causes the enemy to bleed, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) over a few seconds and can be stacked up to 5 times.

2.name: Chomp
2.details:
Hellhound chomps at the target enemy, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) and heals himself for a percentage of his missing health.

During Full Moon, Chomp’s damage and heal will be enhanced.

3.name: Howl
3.details:
Hellhound grants himself and nearby allies increased movement speed that will decay over the next few seconds.

During Full Moon, Hellhound also gains increased attack speed for the same duration.

4.name: Pounce
4.details:
Hellhound pounces in a target direction, grabbing the first enemy hit for a short duration and hitting the target twice, dealing the same damage and on-hit effects as two basic attacks.

During Full Moon, Hellhound will hit thrice instead.

5.name: Full Moon
5.details:
Hellhound transforms into a full-fledged Wolf, gaining increased size, health and physical power for a duration.

In addition, Hellhound can also sense the trails leading to all nearby enemy Heroes. When following a trail, Wolf gains increased movement speed.
